advancements.stellarity.absolute_devotio: Upgrade your Netherite Hoe to its Shulker version. At this point, it's just pure madness...
advancements.stellarity.ambrosia.descrip: Transmute any applicable food item into its divine variant, and then eat it to gain a permanent buff
advancements.stellarity.anger_enderman.d: Enrage an Enderman by looking at it
advancements.stellarity.aota_intro.descr: Toss any Enchanted Book over the Altar of The Accursed to imbue it with the darkest of magic
Eat every food item added by Stellarity, good or bad.
Use Tamaris to execute a mob with low health
advancements.stellarity.champions_ballad: Can't fight a Dragon without some good tunes!
advancements.stellarity.charge_anchor_en: Charge a Respawn Anchor in The End. You can use it to set your respawn point there just like in The Nether
advancements.stellarity.color_a_shulker_: Color a Shulker Box any color you want
advancements.stellarity.conqueror.descri: Destroy all protective End Crystals and fully conquer an End City
...and fuse it with some Blaze Powder
Use the Altar of The Accursed to craft some of the most powerful of gear
Destroy a protective End Crystal of an End City and collect its loot
advancements.stellarity.dilute_breath.de: Throw Dragon's Breath into a Water Cauldron to dilute it. You can then toss in different items to do a little bit of brewing!
advancements.stellarity.dragonborn.descr: Obtain the Dragonblade, a mythical sword of a truly unknown origin
advancements.stellarity.duskberry_find.d: Pick up a Duskberry from a Chest in Hallow's End Ship
advancements.stellarity.dye_elytra.descr: Combine an Elytra with any Dye to change its flight trail
advancements.stellarity.electrified.desc: Dash through 5 different mobs with a single Copper Elektra Shield dash
advancements.stellarity.fae_flayer.descr: Move an Altar of The Sacred to the Overworld, then summon and kill the Empress during the day
advancements.stellarity.find_end_village: Stranded in The Sea of Eternity
Find a Village in the middle of nowhere
advancements.stellarity.god_slayer.descr: You have proven yourself worthy by defeating the vicious Beast twice
advancements.stellarity.hallelujah.descr: Dodge an attack with a full set of Hallowed Armor
advancements.stellarity.harvester.abilit: Absorbed souls restore health and hunger, even if the sword doesn't gain any damage from them
Super cold aura slows nearby mobs, with the effect getting stronger closer to the player

Using a Totem of Undying encases you in a protective ice barrier which grants immunity to all incoming damage and immense healing for its duration. After the effect expires, a large explosion will damage all nearby mobs. Cooldown of 60 seconds
Attacks will deal extra unmitigated damage after a short while
Hit mobs take extra damage from all sources for some time
Killing any mobs gives Absorption and damage reduction
Attacks burn enemies for extra damage. Fiery mobs take extra damage from the debuff
Attacks have a chance to apply a stacking defense reduction effect
advancements.stellarity.harvester.all_ab: ᴛɪᴘ: ᴏɴᴇ ʜᴀʀᴠᴇsᴛᴇʀ ᴄᴀɴ ᴏɴʟʏ ɢᴇᴛ 3 ᴀʙɪʟɪᴛɪᴇs, sᴏ ɢᴇᴛ ᴀ ғᴇᴡ ғᴏʀ ᴛʜᴇ ᴄᴏᴍᴘʟᴇᴛɪᴏɴ ᴏғ ᴛʜɪs ᴄʜᴀʟʟᴇɴɢᴇ
advancements.stellarity.harvester.gain_d: Kill any mob to slightly upgrade a Harvester
advancements.stellarity.harvester.max_ou: Even the grim power of this ice sword has its limits...
advancements.stellarity.i_am_titanium.de: Craft a full set of Shulker Armor
advancements.stellarity.imbuements.descr: Use Dragon's Breath to brew a Lingering Potion
advancements.stellarity.jeb_.description: Craft all color variants of Shulker Boxes
advancements.stellarity.journeys_end.des: Use 12 Eyes of Ender to activate the End Portal
advancements.stellarity.kaliyah.descript: Deal maximum damage possible with a single Dragonblade punch
advancements.stellarity.kaliyah.tip: ᴛɪᴘ: ᴋɴᴏᴄᴋʙᴀᴄᴋ ᴇɴᴄʜᴀɴᴛᴍᴇɴᴛ ɪɴᴄʀᴇᴀsᴇs ᴘᴜɴᴄʜ ᴅᴀᴍᴀɢᴇ
advancements.stellarity.keep_warm.descri: Wear a full set of Leather Armor in any of the coldest biomes of The End
advancements.stellarity.kill_dragon.desc: The Beast is dead and The End is waiting for you to discover its secrets...
advancements.stellarity.kill_large_phant: Kill a Phantom that is bigger than usually
advancements.stellarity.kill_shulker.des: Kill a Shulker for its Shells
advancements.stellarity.night_sky_stalke: Kill a Phantom. They will vanish as soon as you get some sleep
advancements.stellarity.otherwordly_bota: Plant a Chorus Flower in every dimension
advancements.stellarity.poor_life_choice: Eat, plant and feed a Fox a Duskberry
advancements.stellarity.postmortal_2.des: Save yourself from death in The Void with a Totem of Undying
advancements.stellarity.sacrificial_ritu: Place down 4 End Crystals on top of the 4 elevated Bedrock blocks
advancements.stellarity.spirit_assasin.d: 誕生と終焉を使い、テレポートで60ブロック以上移動する。
advancements.stellarity.summon_empress.d: Sacrifice Pixie Dust at the Altar of The Sacred
advancements.stellarity.super_sonic.desc: Use Elytra to fly through a 1 by 1 gap while moving faster than 40 m/s
advancements.stellarity.the_beginning.de: Summon and kill the Wither in The End
advancements.stellarity.third_times_the_: Summon the Ender Dragon for the third time
advancements.stellarity.topped_off.descr: Increase your maximum health by eating 10 Crystal Heartfish
advancements.stellarity.transmute_item.d: Transmute an item into something different by throwing it into the water in The Hallow
advancements.stellarity.void_reels.descr: Cast your Fishing Rod into the open darkness below
block.stellarity.altar_of_light.descript: Can be placed anywhere at any time
the attention of the Fae Goddess
block.stellarity.altar_of_light.flavor_t: 'Not to be confused with Altar of The Accursed'
enchantment.stellarity.ambush.descriptio: Deals extra damage to mobs that aren't actively targetting you
enchantment.stellarity.mighty_wind.descr: Blessed by the Winds of The Dunes
enchantment.stellarity.plated.descriptio: Increases defense, but slows down flight speed
enchantment.stellarity.prismatic_pearl_r: Technical Enchant that makes the Prismatic Pearl return to the player because it was the most efficient way to handle right click detection
enchantment.stellarity.void_shot.descrip: Shots temporarily reduce enemy max HP
enchantment.stellarity.void_strike.descr: Attacks temporarily reduce enemy max HP
filled_map.stellarity.chapel_of_light: 光の礼拝堂探索者の地図
filled_map.stellarity.end_city: エンドシティ探索者の地図
filled_map.stellarity.end_village: エンドの村探索者の地図
item.stellarity.amarene.description: Looks like wine, but it really isn't
item.stellarity.book_of_conveyance.descr: teleports you to the first block it hits
Tilt your head around to guide it
item.stellarity.book_of_light.descriptio: Right Click to summon a friendly aura
which grants healing and damage reduction
item.stellarity.book_of_obstruct.descrip: Sends up a tough shulker wall
item.stellarity.book_of_updraft.descript: Right Click to push yourself upwards
with a light gust of wind, giving you
the ability to glide freely for a short time
item.stellarity.call_of_the_void.descrip: enemy HP and shatter on impact
item.stellarity.champion_armor.set_bonus: Fills you with Wrath of The Dragon,
item.stellarity.copper_elektra_shield.de: Sneak to perform an elektrifying dash!
Can charge up to 3 dashes every 7 seconds
Third dash takes longer to recharge
Dashing through mobs halves recharge time
item.stellarity.crest_of_the_end.descrip: to your next attack in retaliation
item.stellarity.crystal_heartfish.descri: Allows for up to 5 extra hearts
item.stellarity.dragon_wings.description: at the cost of flight speed
item.stellarity.dragonblade.description: 敵を地の果てまで吹き飛ばしてしまう恐ろしい剣！
item.stellarity.dragonblade.flavor_text: この剣はエンドの果てからもたらされた。
item.stellarity.dragonblade.tip: ヒント:敵を壁に向けて吹き飛ばそう。
item.stellarity.fish.goosh.description.1: Can be used in place of
item.stellarity.gilded_purpur_key.descri: Opens Ominous Vaults in End Cities
item.stellarity.harvester.description.1: Absorbs souls of slain mobs and permanently
item.stellarity.harvester.description.3: Certains souls imbue it with magical abilities
item.stellarity.harvester.description.4: しかし、魂を吸収するほど、増加するダメージ値は少なくなる。
item.stellarity.harvester.description.5: The more souls it absorbs, the less damage it gets
item.stellarity.kaleidoscope.description: Channels power from the core of the sun
Strike enemies to release stored energy
all at once in a powerful discharge
Right click on the ground to draw a sigil that
allows you to access Altar of The Accursed
Place in a vertical item frame attached
to create your own permanent copy of the Altar
item.stellarity.prismatic_punch.descript: 虹の弾に変換し撃つことが出来る。
また、爆発が当たったモブに”虹色の炎”を与える。
item.stellarity.prismember.description.1: Sneak to charge up a fiery spin,
item.stellarity.prismember.description.2: igniting all nearby mobs and setting
item.stellarity.red_potion.flavor_text: 'Just drink it, what could go wrong?'
item.stellarity.sandstorm_trident.flavor: 'he didn't want to do a portal gun'
item.stellarity.sharanga.description.1: この弓は光の矢のダメージを増加させ
item.stellarity.sharanga.description.2: 一直線に撃つことができる。
item.stellarity.shulker_boots: 丈夫なシュルカーのブーツ
item.stellarity.shulker_chestplate: 丈夫なシュルカーのチェストプレート
item.stellarity.shulker_helmet: 丈夫なシュルカーのヘルメット
item.stellarity.shulker_leggings: 丈夫なシュルカーのレギンス
item.stellarity.slayer_crossbow.descript: with infinite pierce, but limited range
item.stellarity.soaring_insignia.descrip: Sneak and look up/down to adjust height
item.stellarity.spectral_fury.descriptio: which seek out and attack mobs
item.stellarity.spirit_dagger.descriptio: 攻撃時、敵の魂を引きずり出す。
%sをオフハンドに持ち、引きずり出した魂を見ることで
その魂のある位置にテレポートすることが出来る。
テレポートした場合、敵を斬りつけつつ、バフ効果を得る。
item.stellarity.spirit_dagger.flavor_tex: 魂のダガーよ、安らかに眠れ。
item.stellarity.starless_scythe.descript: Part of dealt damage is converted into healing
Can damage multiple mobs in one swing
item.stellarity.starstruck_shield.descri: Stars will fall after blocking damage
item.stellarity.stellar_striker.descript: Attack or kill mobs to collect stars
Sneak and attack to send the stars flying
all at once to deal high burst damage
item.stellarity.tamaris.description.1: スニークした時、近くにいる瀕死のモブに向かって
item.stellarity.tamaris.description.2: テレポートし、処刑することができる。
item.stellarity.tamaris.flavor_text: チャロ指揮官が所有している。
Can be imbued with any gem
on the Altar of The Accursed
item.stellarity.winged_key.description: Opens the Elytra Vault on End Ships
items.stellarity.armor.set_bonus: フルセット装備時のボーナス効果:
items.stellarity.floral_armor.bonus.1: Shooting an enemy will bloom a flower over
items.stellarity.floral_armor.bonus.2: their head, which will explode shortly after
items.stellarity.floral_armor.bonus.3: Sneak while in tall plants to blend in with them
items.stellarity.hallowed_armor.bonus.1: 攻撃を回避する能力を得る。
items.stellarity.hallowed_armor.bonus.2: 攻撃を回避した時、その攻撃のノックバックとダメージを無効化する。
items.stellarity.shulker_armor.bonus.1: Shulker Bullets will hunt down your attackers
stellarity.advancement_grant_everything: このコマンドは使わないでください。
stellarity.aota.warning: その魔法は強力な獣の後ろに封印されています
stellarity.config.allow_disenchanting.de: 呪われた祭壇を使用して、エンチャントされたアイテムを通常の本と組み合わせることで、エンチャントのバインドを解除する機能をオンにします。 （少し力が強すぎると思われるかもしれません。）
stellarity.config.allow_disenchanting.ti: 魔法解除を有効にする
stellarity.config.always_generate_egg.de: エンダードラゴンを倒した後は必ずドラゴンの卵を生成します。無効にすると、卵は 1 個のみ、最初のキルのみというバニラのスポーン ルールに従います。
stellarity.config.boss_status_messages.d: Sends global messages when a Stellarity boss is summoned, killed or despawns.
stellarity.config.click_to_edit: クリックして変更する。
stellarity.config.dragon_health.descript: エンダードラゴンの最大体力を変更します。 (最大は 1024)
stellarity.config.dragon_health.title: ドラゴンの最大体力
エンドシティのクリスタルにクリエイティブ ショックを適用させます。これにより、すべてのブロックが破壊されるまでブロックの配置と破壊ができなくなります。 (エンドシティは、このオプションが有効になることを中心にバランスが取れています!)
エンドシティクリエイティブショックを有効にする
stellarity.config.enable_dragon_screensh: ドラゴンのスポーンアニメーション中に海賊版のスクリーンシェイクエフェクトを有効にします。人によっては吐き気を催す可能性があるため、自由に無効にしてください。とにかく最高ではありません。
ドラゴン スクリーンシェイクを有効にする
stellarity.config.enable_end_crystal_dro: Makes End Crystals drop themselves on left-click instead of exploding.
エンドシティのいくつかの戦利品チェストの中にトレジャーヘッドがランダムに生成されるようにします。面白い小さな収集品として役立ちます。
Treasure Heads を有効にする
stellarity.config.eol_health.description: 光の皇后の最大体力を変更します。 (最大は 1024)
stellarity.config.eol_health.title: 光の皇后: 体力最大化
stellarity.config.join_message.descripti: この世界に入ったときに Stellarity がロードされていることについての短いメッセージを送信するかどうか。 パック開発者は、「参加メッセージをグローバルに無効にする」アドオンをチェックするように求められます。
stellarity.config.join_message.title: Mod導入確認メッセージ
stellarity.config.migrations.description: Runs migrations every 5 seconds on various old content throughout the game.
stellarity.config.migrations.title: Migrates Old Content
stellarity.config.nerf_elytra.descriptio: Nerfs the Elytra by making them take extra damage from boosting.
stellarity.config.nerf_elytra.title: Nerf Elytra
stellarity.config.track_loop_delay.drago: ドラゴンのボステーマがループするティック数。 (実際に編集する理由がある場合にのみ編集してください。)
ドラゴンミュージックループディレイ
stellarity.config.track_loop_delay.eol.d: Empress of Light のボス テーマがその後ループするティック数。 (実際に編集する理由がある場合にのみ編集してください。)
stellarity.config.track_loop_delay.eol.t: 光の皇后のループ遅延

stellarity.death_messages.eol.prismatic_: %1$s forgot to dodge the Empress of Light's attacks
stellarity.death_messages.kaleidoscope.2: %1$s was turned inside out by %2$s's power from the sun

%1$s realized nature has no equals with help of %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.tamaris_execut: %1$s was forced to see what 999 damage is like by %2$s
